8003ab828429e0ff28379fdc4eaa29f1 (07:11): An Assembly is the .dll or .exe file
8003ab828429e0ff28379fdc4eaa29f1 (07:12): The namespace is a way of grouping classes and enums
8003ab828429e0ff28379fdc4eaa29f1 (07:12): It's not tied to a single assembly
